task-wr.title: Managing Physical Volumes
task-wr.shortdesc: You can add, delete, and review physical volumes on a compute host.

context.p: Physical volumes provide storage using local disks. You can use the web administration or the CLI to manage them. For web administration interface instructions, see .
As each physical volume is created, it is added to an existing local volume group.
